item.title: Mocking Models
item.description: Today I decided to see how much of the test code in my current side project I could rip fixtures out of. At the same time I could see what kind of speed increase I got from staying away from the database. Model tests seem to be the most straight forward so I started there.
item.author: kev

item.title: "Mocking Models" by James Mead
item.description:
Kev: I’m glad you’re finding Mocha useful.

Thorsten: Have you see the Mocha Quickstart article I wrote recently? Does that help at all? If not, what documentation would help most – detailed api/rdoc or higher level tutorial?

item.title: "Mocking Models" by Thorsten
item.description: Very nice! Thanks for taking the time to write this up! Now if only James would write some docs for the whole thing…
